subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*lak ~ C-jak||hand, arm}}. Cognate with {{cog|zh|{{och-l|腋}}||armpit}}, {{cog|bo|ལག་པ||hand, arm}}, {{cog|my|လက်||hand, arm}}
